alt="" class="backgroundImage_3czwH"></picture></div></section></div></div><div data-automation="x-seo-block" class="seoContainer_3yFBJ"><div class="seoText_o9Fa4"><section class="contentContainer_3jS31 xs_marginBottom_s_3QukH s_marginBottom_m_3hdPx m_marginBottom_m_yLaUb textBlockContainer_2M49a"><div class="siteSizeLayout_2_W9H"><div class="textBlockContainer_2M49a dark_11r4Q"><div class="seoTextContent_2ff79 small textContent_2VGrK textBlock_34z0e"><h2 class="sectionTitle_2nLse sectionTitle_2nLse title_2kEQ2">Computers &amp; Tablets are Essential Tools for Work, Play, and Everything In-between</h2><div class=" text_2go6_"><p>Computers are an essential part of modern day life, whether you're shopping on your laptop, getting work done on a desktop, or watching funny cat videos on your tablet (because everybody needs more funny cat videos in their lives). For the best deals on computers in Canada, Best Buy is the first place most people think of, and for good reason. Take our huge selection of computers and accessories, sprinkle in some incredible sales and deals, and you've got the ideal destination for picking up your next computing device.<br></p><h3>Have Fun and Get Things Done with a Laptop</h3><p>When it comes to enhancing your digital life, a <a href="https://www.bestbuy.ca/en-ca/category/laptops/36711">laptop</a> is a must-have. Today's laptops are powerful enough to handle everything you throw at them, from power-intensive tasks like gaming and video editing to everyday stuff like browsing the web and flipping through photos. Since they're portable, you can use one wherever you want: check your Facebook feed while sitting on the couch in front of the TV, finish a report while sipping a foamy drink at the coffee shop, or bring it to your buddy's place to show off photos from your amazing travel adventure.</p><h3>Play and Work Anytime, Anywhere with a Tablet</h3><p><a href="https://www.bestbuy.ca/en-ca/category/tablets-ipads/30297">Tablets</a> hit the sweet spot between form and functionality. They're small enough to fit into your bag, but have enough screen real estate to provide an enjoyable experience for watching videos and reading eBooks or articles. Some models are basically laptops in tablet form, complete with laptop-grade hardware and operating systems (like Windows 10). Simply connect a keyboard (and maybe a mouse or stylus) and you've got fully-functioning computer in a package that's compact enough to carry around everywhere you go.</p><h3>Desktop Computers Provide Maximum Power and Productivity</h3><p>If you prefer to use your computer while sitting at your desk or need to do some heavy-duty work, a <a href="https://www.bestbuy.ca/en-ca/category/desktop-computers/20213">desktop computer</a> is the way to go. You can get great computer hardware for a reasonable price, and PCs are upgradeable so you can swap out a processor or boost the memory if you feel the need. Some desktops are designed for specific uses: a <a href="https://www.bestbuy.ca/en-ca/category/gaming-desktop-computers/30441">gaming PC</a> features high-octane hardware that can handle graphics-heavy games, while a mini PC includes budget-friendly, customizable components that are perfect for a variety of uses.</p><h3>Make Your Computer Even More Useful with Add-ons and Accessories</h3><p>Once you've decided which type of computer meets your needs, you can start looking for add-ons and accessories that'll enhance the experience. If you want bigger visuals, pick up a <a href="https://www.bestbuy.ca/en-ca/category/monitors/20367">monitor</a> and get all the screen you need. <a href="https://www.bestbuy.ca/en-ca/category/wi-fi-and-networking/21099">Networking components</a>, like wireless routers, are essential for creating a Wi-Fi hotspot so you can keep your laptop or tablet supplied with a strong wireless signal throughout the house. <a href="https://www.bestbuy.ca/en-ca/category/printers-scanners-fax/20330">Printers</a> allow you to produce important documents, and some multifunction models can also scan and make copies. Need to carry your laptop around? Pick up a <a href="https://www.bestbuy.ca/en-ca/category/laptop-cases-bags/25215">laptop bag or case</a> so it can be a constant companion throughout your busy day.</p><h3>Want more info about computers &amp; tablets? Check out some of our resources:</h3><p><a href="https://blog.bestbuy.ca/computers-laptops-tablets/comparing-chromebooks-macbooks-and-windows-laptops">Comparing Chromebooks, MacBooks and Windows laptops</a></p><p><a href="https://blog.bestbuy.ca/computers-laptops-tablets/is-adding-a-keyboard-to-a-tablet-or-ipad-good-enough-to-replace-a-laptop-for-school">Is adding a keyboard to a tablet or iPad good enough to replace a laptop for school?</a></p><p><a href="https://blog.bestbuy.ca/computers-laptops-tablets/laptop-buying-guide">Laptop Buying Guide</a></p><p><a href="https://blog.bestbuy.ca/computers-laptops-tablets/computers/desktop-pc-buying-guide">Desktop PC buying guide</a></p><p><a href="https://blog.bestbuy.ca/computers-laptops-tablets/tablet-ipad-buying-guide">Tablet and iPad Buying Guide</a></p></div></div></div></div></section></div></div><div class="adSenseWrapper_2MdIE" Shop now!","overviewTitle":"Computers & Tablets are Essential Tools for Work, Play, and Everything In-between","overview":"<p>Computers are an essential part of modern day life, whether you're shopping on your laptop, getting work done on a desktop, or watching funny cat videos on your tablet (because everybody needs more funny cat videos in their lives). For the best deals on computers in Canada, Best Buy is the first place most people think of, and for good reason. Take our huge selection of computers and accessories, sprinkle in some incredible sales and deals, and you've got the ideal destination for picking up your next computing device.<br></p><h3>Have Fun and Get Things Done with a Laptop</h3><p>When it comes to enhancing your digital life, a <a href=\"https://www.bestbuy.ca/en-ca/category/laptops/36711\">laptop</a> is a must-have. Today's laptops are powerful enough to handle everything you throw at them, from power-intensive tasks like gaming and video editing to everyday stuff like browsing the web and flipping through photos. Since they're portable, you can use one wherever you want: check your Facebook feed while sitting on the couch in front of the TV, finish a report while sipping a foamy drink at the coffee shop, or bring it to your buddy's place to show off photos from your amazing travel adventure.</p><h3>Play and Work Anytime, Anywhere with a Tablet</h3><p><a href=\"https://www.bestbuy.ca/en-ca/category/tablets-ipads/30297\">Tablets</a> hit the sweet spot between form and functionality. They're small enough to fit into your bag, but have enough screen real estate to provide an enjoyable experience for watching videos and reading eBooks or articles. Some models are basically laptops in tablet form, complete with laptop-grade hardware and operating systems (like Windows 10). Simply connect a keyboard (and maybe a mouse or stylus) and you've got fully-functioning computer in a package that's compact enough to carry around everywhere you go.</p><h3>Desktop Computers Provide Maximum Power and Productivity</h3><p>If you prefer to use your computer while sitting at your desk or need to do some heavy-duty work, a <a href=\"https://www.bestbuy.ca/en-ca/category/desktop-computers/20213\">desktop computer</a> is the way to go. You can get great computer hardware for a reasonable price, and PCs are upgradeable so you can swap out a processor or boost the memory if you feel the need. Some desktops are designed for specific uses: a <a href=\"https://www.bestbuy.ca/en-ca/category/gaming-desktop-computers/30441\">gaming PC</a> features high-octane hardware that can handle graphics-heavy games, while a mini PC includes budget-friendly, customizable components that are perfect for a variety of uses.</p><h3>Make Your Computer Even More Useful with Add-ons and Accessories</h3><p>Once you've decided which type of computer meets your needs, you can start looking for add-ons and accessories that'll enhance the experience. If you want bigger visuals, pick up a <a href=\"https://www.bestbuy.ca/en-ca/category/monitors/20367\">monitor</a> and get all the screen you need. <a href=\"https://www.bestbuy.ca/en-ca/category/wi-fi-and-networking/21099\">Networking components</a>, like wireless routers, are essential for creating a Wi-Fi hotspot so you can keep your laptop or tablet supplied with a strong wireless signal throughout the house. <a href=\"https://www.bestbuy.ca/en-ca/category/printers-scanners-fax/20330\">Printers</a> allow you to produce important documents, and some multifunction models can also scan and make copies. Need to carry your laptop around? Pick up a <a href=\"https://www.bestbuy.ca/en-ca/category/laptop-cases-bags/25215\">laptop bag or case</a> so it can be a constant companion throughout your busy day.</p><h3>Want more info about computers & tablets?     <script>
        let isPcEventListenerAttached = false;
        let isClosePcEventListenerAttached = false;
        const poll = setInterval(function() {
            const preferenceCentreBtn = document.getElementById("onetrust-pc-btn-handler");
            const closePreferenceCentreBtn = document.getElementById("close-pc-btn-handler");

            if (preferenceCentreBtn && !isPcEventListenerAttached) {
                preferenceCentreBtn.addEventListener("click", function(e){
                    document.getElementById("onetrust-banner-sdk").style.display = "none";
                })
                isPcEventListenerAttached = true
            }

            if (closePreferenceCentreBtn && !isClosePcEventListenerAttached) {
                closePreferenceCentreBtn.addEventListener("click", function(e){
                    window.OneTrust.LoadBanner();
                    const banner = document.getElementById("onetrust-banner-sdk");
                    // Banner appears when it is loaded for the first time for the consent
                    if (banner) banner.style.display = "block";
                })
                isClosePcEventListenerAttached = true
            }

            if (isPcEventListenerAttached && isClosePcEventListenerAttached) clearInterval(poll);
        }, 1000);

    </script>

<div id="onetrust-consent-sdk"><div class="onetrust-pc-dark-filter ot-fade-in" style="z-index:2147483645;"></div><div id="onetrust-banner-sdk" class="otFlat otRelFont bottom vertical-align-content" tabindex="0" role="region" aria-label="your privacy is important" style="bottom: 0px;"><div role="dialog" aria-modal="true" aria-label="Your privacy is important."><div class="ot-sdk-container"><div class="ot-sdk-row"><div id="onetrust-group-container" class="ot-sdk-eight ot-sdk-columns ot-sdk-eleven"><div class="banner_logo"></div><div id="onetrust-policy"><h2 id="onetrust-policy-title">Your privacy is important.</h2><div id="onetrust-policy-text">

//  Probably a better way to implement this in 2024.

var getEnhancements = function(offers) {
  
  var finalOffers = [];
  var reducedJSONOffers = offers.filter(function(o) {
   return o.type === "json";
  });
  
  var reducedHTMLOffers = offers.filter(function(o) {
   return o.type === "html";
  });
  
  if (reducedJSONOffers.length > 0) {
    reducedJSONOffers.forEach(function(offer){
      finalOffers.push(offer.content);
    })
    //finalOffers = finalOffers.concat(reducedJSONOffers[0].content)
  }
  
  if (reducedHTMLOffers.length > 0) {
      reducedHTMLOffers.forEach(function(offer, index){
          try {
            finalOffers.push(JSON.parse(offer.content));
          }
          catch(e){
            _satellite.logger.warn('==== Target: GETOFFER FAILURE: The reco at index: ' + index + ' failed to parse to JSON and  will not be in enhancements event ====');
          }
      });
  }
  return finalOffers.length > 0 ? finalOffers : null;
};

//NOTE: if this is necessary needs to be reevaluated, was this just for mobile apps?
// Jan 16th: we fixed issue with corrupted mboxSession being empty param,
// (fixed by monkey patching req url with value)
// however, we still seeing issue with bad req, so logging entire req
// to see if there are other issues
(function() {
    var ajaxOpen = XMLHttpRequest.prototype.open;
    XMLHttpRequest.prototype.open = function(method, reqUrl) {
      if (!/bestbuycanada\.tt\.omtrdc\.net/.test(reqUrl)) {
        // return early
        return ajaxOpen.apply(this, [method, reqUrl]);
      }

      // patch fix
      var DEFAULT_MBOX_SESSION = 'e872a74cc53145aea95c5f240cadc1e5';
      var patchedUrl = reqUrl;
      if (/mboxSession=\&/i.test(reqUrl)) {
        var previousSession = _satellite.cookie.get('dtm_mSession') || DEFAULT_MBOX_SESSION;
        var patchedMboxSession = 'mboxSession=' + previousSession + '&';
        patchedUrl = reqUrl.replace(/mboxSession=\&/ig, patchedMboxSession);
      } else {
        var mboxSessionStr = _satellite.cookie.get('mbox').split('|').filter(function(el) { return /session/ig.test(el); }).join() || '';
        mboxSessionStr = mboxSessionStr.split('#')[1] || DEFAULT_MBOX_SESSION;
        _satellite.cookie.set('dtm_mSession', mboxSessionStr, {expires: 7});
      }

      return ajaxOpen.apply(this, [method, patchedUrl]);
    };
})();
window.mboxFetch = function(mbox, params, shouldApplyOffers, payload ) {
  try {
    var mboxCookieStr = _satellite.cookie.get('mbox') || '';
    var AMCVCookie = _satellite.cookie.get('AMCV_D6E638125859683E0A495D2D@AdobeOrg') || '';
    var paramsObj = Object.assign({}, params);
    paramsObj.at_property = "fc53a67f-eeaf-6c6d-9c82-64ad36aae2bd";
    window.persistentMetaData = window.persistentMetaData || {};
    window.persistentMetaData.mboxCookie = mboxCookieStr + ',' + AMCVCookie;
    window.persistentMetaData.mboxLoadTime = window.persistentMetaData.mboxLoadTime || {};
    if(payload && payload.request) {
      payload.request.property = {token: paramsObj.at_property}
    }

    _satellite.logger.log('=== Target: Fetching mbox ' + mbox +  ' ===');
    adobe.target.getOffers(payload || {
        request: {
            execute: {
                pageLoad: {
                    parameters: params
                }
            },
            property: {
                token: paramsObj.at_property
            }
        }
    }).then(function(offers) {
      window.__lastOffers = offers;
      if(offers && offers.execute && offers.execute.pageLoad && offers.execute.pageLoad.options) {
         _satellite.logger.log("==== Target: Offers found ====");
          if(shouldApplyOffers) {
            var isProductPurchasable = true;
            try {
              if(AppEventData.computedState && AppEventData.computedState.state) {
                var currentState = AppEventData.computedState.state;
                if (currentState.product && currentState.product.availability) {
                  //isProductPurchasable = currentState.product.availability.pickup.purchasable || currentState.product.availability.shipping.purchasable;
                  isProductPurchasable = currentState.product.availability.shipping.purchasable;
                }
              }
            } catch(e) {
              console.error('error in detecting product availability', e)
            }
              _satellite.logger.log("==== Target: Applying offers ====");
                // Notify Enhancements module
                var options = [];
                
                // This is NOT a boolean, it's a reference to the first set of boughtAlsoBought items
                // It's also the variable where we'll store all our boughtAlsoBought items that we eventually want to show to the customer
                var firstBoughtAlsoBought;
                offers.execute.pageLoad.options.forEach(function(option) {
                  
                  // Parsed data for the current option, if it contains boughtAlsoBought data. 
                  var parsedContent;
                  var isUnavailableRecommendation = false;
                  if(typeof(option.content) === "string" && option.content.indexOf("product.recommendations.unavailable") !== -1 && !isProductPurchasable) {
                    try {
                      option.content = option.content.split("product.recommendations.unavailable").join("product.recommendations.boughtAlsoBought")
                      parsedContent = JSON.parse(option.content);
                      isUnavailableRecommendation = true;
                    } catch (e) {
                      console.error('Error parsing unavailable recommendation', e);
                      console.log('Error', option);
                    }
                  } else if(typeof(option.content) === "string" && option.content.indexOf("product.recommendations.boughtAlsoBought") !== -1) {
                    option.content = option.content.split("\\ ").join("");
                    try {
                      parsedContent = JSON.parse(option.content);
                    } catch (e) {
                      console.error('Error parsing recommendation', e);
                      console.log('Error', option);
                    }
                  } else {
                    options.push(option);
                  }
                  if(!firstBoughtAlsoBought && parsedContent && parsedContent.products && parsedContent.products.length) {
                    firstBoughtAlsoBought = option;
                
                  // If we already have a boughtAlsoBought, then 
                  } else if(firstBoughtAlsoBought) {
                    
                    // Parse out the boughtAlsoBought data collection
                    var parsedFirstBoughtAlsoBought = JSON.parse(firstBoughtAlsoBought.content);
                    
                    // If we don't yet have 6 boughtAlsoBought items, then see if we can add some more
                    if(parsedFirstBoughtAlsoBought.products.length < 6 && parsedContent && parsedContent.products && parsedContent.products.length) {
                      if(!isUnavailableRecommendation) {
                        parsedContent.products = parsedContent.products.reverse();
                      }
                      
                      // Go through the current option's boughtAlsoBought items
                      parsedContent.products.forEach(function(item){
                        // if current product's available for purchase, then put these new items at the end of the list of boughtAlsoBoughts items
                        // Otherwise put them at the beginning of the list of boughtAlsoBoughts items
                        if(!isUnavailableRecommendation) {
                          parsedFirstBoughtAlsoBought.products.push(item);
                        } else if(isUnavailableRecommendation) {
                          parsedFirstBoughtAlsoBought.products.unshift(item);
                        }
                      });
                      var productsWithNoDuplicate = [];
                      var productsHash = {}
                      
                      // De-dupe boughtAlsoBought items gathered so far. Should have no more than 6 items in the final collection.
                      parsedFirstBoughtAlsoBought.products.forEach(function(newItem){
                        if(productsWithNoDuplicate.length < 6 && !productsHash[newItem.sku]){
                          productsHash[newItem.sku] = true;
                          productsWithNoDuplicate.push(newItem);
                        }
                      });
                      parsedFirstBoughtAlsoBought.products = productsWithNoDuplicate;
                      firstBoughtAlsoBought.content = JSON.stringify(parsedFirstBoughtAlsoBought);
                    }
                  }
                });
            
                if(firstBoughtAlsoBought) {
                  var items = document.querySelectorAll('div[class^="row_"] div[class^="col-xs-6"][class*="col-sm-3"]');
                  if(items.length === 0) {
                    options.push(firstBoughtAlsoBought);
                  }
                }

            
                document.dispatchEvent(window.enhancementsLoadedEvent = new CustomEvent(
                    "enhancements-loaded", {
                        detail: {
                            enhancements: getEnhancements(options),
                        }
                    }));
                /*making sure that this event gets processed last by the app*/
                document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent(
                    "enhancements-loaded", {
                        detail: {
                            enhancements: [{
                                areas: "product.recommendations",
                                products: {loaded: true},
                                strategy: "extend_store",
                            }],
                        }
                    }));
          }
      } else if(shouldApplyOffers && offers && offers.execute && offers.execute.mboxes) {
         _satellite.logger.log("==== Target: Applying mboxes offers ====");
        for (var i = 0; i < offers.execute.mboxes.length; i++) {
          var mbox = offers.execute.mboxes[i];
          if (mbox.options) {
            _satellite.logger.log("==== Target: Dispatching mbox:"+mbox.name+" offers ====");
            document.dispatchEvent(
              window.enhancementsLoadedEvent = new CustomEvent("enhancements-loaded", {
                detail: {
                  enhancements: getEnhancements(mbox.options),
                  mbox: mbox.name
                }
              })
            );
          }

        }

      }
    });
  } catch (e) {
    _satellite.logger.error('==== Target: failed to load ====');
    _satellite.logger.error(e);
  }
};

// Mbox error tracking
var errorTrackingHandler = function(e) {
  _satellite.logger.error( 'Adobe Target Error Type:' + e.detail.type + ' Message:' + e.detail.message );
};

document.addEventListener(adobe.target.event["CONTENT_RENDERING_FAILED"], errorTrackingHandler);
document.addEventListener(adobe.target.event["REQUEST_FAILED"], errorTrackingHandler);
</script><script>
document.addEventListener(adobe.target.event.REQUEST_SUCCEEDED, function(e) {

    _satellite.logger.log(e.detail);
    window.TGMResponse = e.detail;
  
});
</script><script>_satellite["_runScript1"](function(event, target, Promise) {
//  This should probably be moved to a different rule and cleaned up as well.

async function GetCustomerID() {
  function buf2hex(buffer) { // buffer is an ArrayBuffer
    return [...new Uint8Array(buffer)]
      .map(x => x.toString(16).padStart(2, '0'))
      .join('');
  }
  
  // Check for performance consent for setting user_id is done in the Data Element itself.
  // Removing the check for performance consent here so that hashedAccountId can be set regardless of consent as it is used for creating PPID as well.
  const cookieObj = Object.fromEntries(window.document.cookie.split(';').map(x => x.trim().split('=')))
  //If the ta object exists, then the user is somewhat signed in, so return the cid cookie with is the customer id
  //cid will exist if the user has logged in in the past and we can use that cookie for our hashedAccountId
  const possibleCid = cookieObj.ta || cookieObj.cid ? cookieObj.cid : null;
  const possibleAid = cookieObj.ta || cookieObj.aid ? cookieObj.aid : null;

  if(possibleAid) // aid is the hashed account id from the server if it's returned
  {
    localStorage.setItem('hashedAccountID', possibleAid)
  }
  else if(possibleCid) // if aid is not returned, then we just hash ourselves (as a temp measure until server hashing is done)
  {
    const cid = JSON.parse(decodeURIComponent(possibleCid));
    const customerID = cid.id.replace("{", "").replace("}", "")
    const hashedAccountID = buf2hex( await crypto.subtle.digest('SHA-256', new TextEncoder().encode(customerID)))
    localStorage.setItem('hashedAccountID', hashedAccountID)
  }
  else // there's no user, set empty string
  {
    localStorage.setItem('hashedAccountID', "")
  }
}

GetCustomerID();
});</script><script>
